abstract.text: A template for displaying an image and text in a single line.

inlineContent.text: to create complications for watchOS 10 or later. For more information, see Migrating to WidgetKit.

platforms.message: On watchOS 9.0 or later, use WidgetKit instead
platforms.name: watchOS

inlineContent.text: The following table lists the dimensions of the image you use in this template. All dimensions are in pixels. All images must be specified as
images for display on Apple Watch, so the point-based dimensions are half the listed size. The width of the image must be between the specified minimum and maximum (inclusive).
Instead of providing multiple images with different resolutions, you can provide a single, scaleable PDF asset. For more information, see

abstract.text: Display app-specific data on the clock face.
A small square or rectangular area that ClockKit Displays on the Utility, Mickey, Chronograph, and Simple watch faces.
An abstract class that defines the base behavior for all templates.
A template for displaying an image and text in a single line.
The image to display.
Creates a new template that has a single line of text.
Creates a new template that has a single row with an image and a line of text.
Returns a new template that has a single line of text.
Returns a new template that has a single row with an image and a line of text.
The text to display.
A template for displaying an image encircled by a configurable progress ring
A template for displaying text encircled by a configurable progress ring.
A template for displaying a single square image.
Extend the reach of your app by creating widgets, watch complications, Live Activities, and controls.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.

media-2933759.alt: A diagram showing the layout of the utilitarian small flat complication. The diagram shows a single row containing an image and a small amount of text.

inlineContent.text: to create complications for watchOS 10 or later. For more information, see Migrating to WidgetKit.
